git_rationale.root_cause_commits: ef0ed28, f9634dc - timeline data loss without tracking
git_rationale.why_issue_occurred: No modification tracking system in place. Agents use scripts/save.py but don't record what changed, who changed it, or why. When JSON files are modified, impossible to audit or rollback specific changes
git_rationale.how_fix_addresses_root: Three-layer super protection ensures all saves are logged and traceable: (1) log-modification.py provides structured logging interface, (2) Agent prompts enforce mandatory logging before save.py, (3) Pre-save hook validates log entry exists and warns if missing

implementation_approach.layer_1: scripts/log-modification.py - Parameterized helper script for appending log entries with atomic writes
implementation_approach.layer_2: Agent prompt modifications - Added mandatory Step 3 (Create modification log entry) to all 8 agent workflows before save.py execution
implementation_approach.layer_3: .claude/hooks/pre-save-validation.sh - Pre-save validation hook that warns if no recent log entry exists
implementation_approach.prompt_engineering: Used prompt engineering (not external config files) to embed logging discipline into agent behavior
implementation_approach.non_blocking_approach: Hook uses warnings rather than hard blocks to avoid breaking existing workflows while strongly encouraging compliance
